name: Triassic
description: 251.902 - 201.4 mya$(br)$(l)WTF Triassic!$()$(br)The Triassic is characterized by the recovery of earth from the P-T Extinction shown by all the weird animals scrambling to fill ecological niches during the early Triassic followed by the rise of Dinosaurs in the Mid-Late Triassic and finally ending with an extinction event.
